sourcesContent:
import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { FormService } from 'src/app/form.service'; import { Formulaire } from 'src/app/models/formulaire'; @Component({ selector: 'app-form', templateUrl: './form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./form.component.css'] }) export class FormComponent { @Input() personne: Formulaire[] = []; @Output() sendForm = new EventEmitter(); constructor( private formServ: FormService ) { } ngOnInit() { } onSubmit(formulaire: Formulaire) { this.formServ.addFormulaire(formulaire); console.log(formulaire); this.sendForm.emit(formulaire); } }
